amendment.description: To permit grants to be used for broadcasting outside the Middle East region.

vote.text: Amendment SA 268 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 268 proposed by Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S3175; text: CR S3175) To permit grants to be used for broadcasting outside the Middle East region.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 268 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 268 proposed by Senator Lugar.
